sen.j: イノダコーヒは京都市に本店・本社を置くコーヒーのチェーン店。
sen.e: Inoda Coffee is a chain shop for coffee headquartered in Kyoto City.
Inoda Coffee is a chain of coffee shops headquartered in Kyoto City.
Inoda Coffee is a chain of coffee shops headquartered in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 株式会社イノダコーヒが運営している。
sen.e: It is operated by Kabushikikaisha Inoda Coffee ('株式会社イノダコーヒ'の正式な英文社名(またはその存否)が確認できておりません.)
It is operated by Kabushikikaisha Inoda Coffee ('株式会社イノダコーヒ'の正式な英文社名(またはその存否)が確認できておりません.)
It is operated by Kabushiki Kaisha Inoda Coffee (株式会社イノダコーヒ).
sen.cmt: 正式英文名が不明のため、Kabushiki Kaisha Inoda Coffee (株式会社イノダコーヒ) としました。

sen.j: イノダコーヒーと書かれる場合もあるが、正式名称には末尾の長音符は付かない。
sen.e: It is sometimes written as "イノダコーヒー," but its official name does not have any macron at the end.
It is sometimes written as "イノダコーヒー," but its official name does not have any macron at the end.
It is sometimes written as "イノダコーヒー," but its official name does not have any macron at the end.

sen.j: 赤いコーヒーポットの絵柄が商標に使われている。
sen.e: A pictorial device representing a red coffee pot is used in its trademark.
A pictorial device representing a red coffee pot is used in its trademark.
A pictorial device representing a red coffee pot is used in its trademark.

sen.j: また、画家でもあった創業者の猪田七郎が描いた「豆を運ぶロバと男」の絵も同社の象徴である。
sen.e: Also, a painting of "a donkey and a man transporting beans" painted by Shichiro INODA, who was the founder of the company is also a symbol of the company.
Also, a painting of "a donkey and a man transporting beans" painted by Shichiro INODA, who was the founder of the company is also a symbol of the company.
Also, a painting of 'a donkey and a man transporting beans' painted by Shichiro INODA, who was the founder of the company is also a symbol of the company.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更

sen.j: 京都市中京区の堺町通三条通の本店など市の中心部に数店を展開するほか、近年は札幌駅、東京駅、広島駅の各駅前などにも大丸内を中心に出店している。
sen.e: In addition to several shops deployed in the central part of the city including the main shop at Sakaimachidori Sanjodori in Nakagyo Ward in Kyoto City, it set up recently branches in the immediate vicinity of Sapporo Station, Tokyo Station, Hiroshima Station, etc. mainly in Daimaru.

In addition to several shops deployed in the central part of the city including the main shop at Sakaimachidori Sanjodori in Nakagyo Ward in Kyoto City, it recently setup branches in the immediate vicinity of Sapporo Station, Tokyo Station, Hiroshima Station, etc. mainly in Daimaru.

In addition to several shops deployed in the central part of the city including the main shop on the corner of Sakaimachi-dori and Sanjo-dori Streets in Nakagyo Ward in Kyoto City, it recently setup branches in the immediate vicinity of Sapporo Station, Tokyo Station, Hiroshima Station, etc. mainly in the Daimaru department stores.
sen.cmt: at Sakaimachidori Sanjodori→on the corner of Sakaimachi-dori and Sanjo-dori Streetsとし、Daimaru→the Daimaru department storesとしました。

sen.j: 京都市内の店舗はすべて喫煙席があり、分煙方式となっている。
sen.e: Shops in Kyoto City have smoking section and adopted bunen system (system of diving seats into smoking and non-smoking areas).
Shops in Kyoto City have sa moking section and adopted a bunen system (system of diving seats into smoking and non-smoking areas).
Shops in Kyoto City have a smoking section and adopted a bunen system (system of diving seats into smoking and non-smoking areas).

sen.j: 商品構成など
sen.e: Composition of items offered
Production structure

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 比較的高級な路線で運営を行なっており、スターバックスやタリーズコーヒーなどの大手チェーンの倍程度の価格帯でコーヒーなどの飲料を提供している。
sen.e: Operation is based on rather high-class policy and it offers coffee and other drinks at the price range of around the double of those of the major chain shops such as Starbucks and Tully's Coffee.
It is operated as a high class establishment and offers coffee and other drinks at a price range that is double of those of major chains such as Starbucks and Tully's Coffee.
It is operated as a high class establishment and offers coffee and other drinks at a price range that is double of those of major chains such as Starbucks and Tully's Coffee.

sen.j: 以前は必ず砂糖とミルクの入った状態でコーヒーが提供されていたが、近年はこれらを分けるか事前に質問される。
sen.e: In the past, sugar and milk was served already mixed with coffee, but in recent years, you are asked if you want to get them separately.
In the past, sugar and milk were served already mixed in the coffee, but in recent years, customers are asked if they want them separately.
In the past, sugar and milk were served already mixed in the coffee, but in recent years, customers are asked if they want them separately.

sen.j: 一方、サンドイッチなどの軽食はデカ盛り近畿地方があり本店等で食べられる「京の朝食」はボリュームたっぷりの朝食である。
sen.e: On the other hand, there is dekamori Kinki chiho (extra-large helping in Kinki region) for light meal like sandwich and "Kyo no choshoku (breakfast of Kyoto), which we can eat in the main shop, etc., is a breakfast of large volume.
sen.cmt: 「サンドイッチなどの軽食はデカ盛り近畿地方があり」の個所は、意味不明ですが、訳文のように解釈しました。
sen.e: On the other hand, there is dekamori Kinki chiho (extra-large helping in Kinki region) for light meals like sandwich and "Kyo no choshoku (breakfast of Kyoto), a large volume breakfast can be eaten within the main shop.

On the other hand, there is dekamori Kinki chiho (extra-large helping in Kinki region) for light meals like sandwich and 'Kyo no choshoku' (breakfast of Kyoto), a large volume breakfast can be eaten within the main shop.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更、位置を移動

sen.j: 自社の焙煎工場とケーキ工場を有し、特にコーヒー豆や挽いた粉については店頭だけでなく全国各地の百貨店、スーパーマーケット、茶葉店などでも販売されている。
sen.e: The company has its own roasting plant and cake manufacturing plant, and coffee beans and ground powder are sold not only in the shops, but also in department stores, supermarkets and tea shops in various places in Japan.

The company has its own roasting plant and cake manufacturing plant, as well as coffee beans and ground powder which are sold not only in shops, but also in department stores, supermarkets and tea shops in various places in Japan.

The company has its own roasting plant and cake manufacturing plant, as well as coffee beans and ground powder which are sold not only in shops, but also in department stores, supermarkets and tea shops in various places in Japan.

sen.j: 「アラビアの真珠」と名付けたブレンドのコーヒーが特に有名。
sen.e: In particular, blended coffee named "Arabian Pearl" is famous.
Its blended coffee named "Arabian Pearl" is particularly famous.
Its blended coffee named 'Arabian Pearl' is particularly famous.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更

sen.j: 自社の店頭やオンライン通信販売ではコーヒー以外にも、コーヒーカップなど食器類・アクセサリといった商品を取り扱っている、
sen.e: Through own shops and on-line mail order system, in addition to coffee, tableware such as coffee cup and accessories are offered.
Tableware such as coffee cups and accessories are offered in addition to coffee through their own shops and an online mail order system.
Tableware such as coffee cups and accessories are offered in addition to coffee through their own shops and an online mail order system.

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1940年6月に猪田七郎が現・本店の場所で海外産コーヒーの卸売を始め、1947年8月にコーヒーショップを開いたのが創業である。
sen.e: Foundation of its business is that, in June 1940, Shichiro INODA started wholesale of overseas coffee in the place where the present main shop exists and in August 1947 opened a coffee shop.

It was founded in June 1940, when Shichiro INODA started a wholesale overseas coffee business, located in the place where the current main shop exists, and in August 1947 opened the first coffee shop.

It was founded in June 1940, when Shichiro INODA started a wholesale overseas coffee business, located in the place where the current main shop exists, and in August 1947 opened the first coffee shop.

sen.j: この時、客が会話に夢中になってコーヒーが冷め、砂糖とミルクがうまく混ざらなかった事があった。
sen.e: At that time, a customer devoted itself in conversation and coffee got cold and sugar and milk could not be mixed well.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: At that time, customers devoted themselves to conversation and as the coffee become cold, the surgar and milk would not mix well.
At that time, customers devoted themselves to conversation and as the coffee become cold, the surgar and milk would not mix well.

sen.j: これがきっかけとなり、初めから砂糖とミルクを入れた状態でのコーヒーの提供が始められた。
sen.e: With this as a start, it was commenced to serve coffee with sugar and milk mixed in advance.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This kickstarted the tradition of serving coffee with sugar and milk mixed ahead of time.
This kickstarted the tradition of serving coffee with sugar and milk mixed ahead of time.

sen.j: 1958年5月に法人として有限会社イノダコーヒを設立し、1964年の二条通支店の出店を皮切りに京都市内へ店舗を展開していった。
sen.e: In May 1958, Yugen Kaisha Inoda Coffee was established as a corporation and starting with opening Nijodori branch in 1964, shops were deployed in Kyoto City.
In May 1958, Yugen Kaisha Inoda Coffee was established as a corporation and started by opening Nijodori branch in 1964, while shops were deployed in Kyoto City.
In May 1958, Yugen Kaisha Inoda Coffee was established as a corporation and started by opening Nijodori branch in 1964, while shops were deployed in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 1970年代初頭には女性向ファッション雑誌のアンアンやnon-noが創刊され、その中で店舗が紹介されて女性客の比率が半分を超えるようになり、この傾向は現在まで続く。
sen.e: In early 1970's, fashion magazines aimed at women, such as anan and non-no, were begun and shops were introduced in such magazines and the ratio of women customer exceeded a half and this trend continued up until now.

In the early 1970's, fashion magazines aimed at women, such as anan and non-no were founded, and shops were introduced by such magazines and the ratio of female customers exceeded half; his trend has continued up to the present.

In the early 1970's, fashion magazines aimed at women, such as anan and non-no were founded, and shops were introduced by such magazines and the ratio of female customers exceeded half; this trend has continued up to the present.

sen.j: 1978年には現在も主力商品となっているブレンドコーヒー、「アラビアの真珠」を発売した。
sen.e: In 1978, blended coffee "Arabian Pearl," which is the leading product even today, was launched.
In 1978, their blended coffee "Arabian Pearl," which is the leading product even today, was launched.
In 1978, their blended coffee 'Arabian Pearl,' which is the leading product even today, was launched.
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更

sen.j: なお開業時から自社で焙煎を行なっていたが、1987年にケーキ工場を開設し、1994年には焙煎工場とともにリニューアルを行なった。
sen.e: Since its foundation, it has been carrying out in-house roasting, and, in 1987, opened a cake manufacturing plant and it was renewed in 1994 together with the roasting plant.
Since its foundation, it has been carrying out in-house roasting, and, in 1987, opened a cake manufacturing plant and was renewed in 1994 together with the roasting plant.
Since its foundation, it has been carrying out in-house roasting, and, in 1987, opened a cake manufacturing plant and was renewed in 1994 together with the roasting plant.

sen.j: また1993年6月に創業者の猪田七郎が逝去し、翌月に長男の猪田浩史が社長に就任している。
sen.e: In June 1993, the founder, Shichiro INODA, died and his first son, Hiroshi INODA, assumed the position of the president in the next month.
In June 1993, the founder, Shichiro INODA, died and his first son, Hiroshi INODA, assumed the position of the president the following month.
In June 1993, the founder, Shichiro INODA, died and his first son, Hiroshi INODA, assumed the position of the president the following month.

sen.j: 1995年には資本金を3千万円に増資して株式会社に組織変更した。
sen.e: In 1995, the capital was increased to thirty million yen and the company was changed into a kabusikikaish (joint-stock company).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In 1995, the capital was increased to thirty million yen and the company was changed into a kabusikikaish (joint-stock company).
In 1995, the capital was increased to thirty million yen and the company was changed into a kabusiki kaisha (joint-stock company).

sen.j: 1999年には初の京都以外の店舗である広島支店を開店するなど、業績を拡大してきた。
sen.e: It has expanded its business, for example, by opening Hiroshima branch in 1999 as the first shop outside Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It has expanded its business, for example, by opening the Hiroshima branch in 1999 as the first shop outside Kyoto.
It has expanded its business, for example, by opening the Hiroshima branch in 1999 as the first shop outside Kyoto.

sen.j: 2007年に猪田浩史が会長となり、社長には藤原正康が就任した。
sen.e: In 2007, Hiroshi INODA assumed the position of chairman, and Masaya's FUJIWARA assumed the position of president.
In 2007, Hiroshi INODA assumed the position of chairman, and Masaya's FUJIWARA assumed the position of president.

sen.j: 創業の地にあり、本社を併設する。
sen.e: It is located on the place of its foundation and the head office exists in the same place.
It is located in the spot where the company was founded and the head office exists in the same place.
It is located in the spot where the company was founded and the head office exists in the same place.

sen.j: 創業時の木造店舗は1967年に増築されて用いられていたが、1999年4月9日に開店準備中の失火で半焼した。
sen.e: The wooden shop building at the time of foundation was extended in 1967 and used, but it was partly destroyed by fire during preparation for opening on April 9, 1999.
The wooden shop building that had existed since its foundation was extended in 1967 and used, but was partly destroyed by fire during preparation for its opening on April 9, 1999.
The wooden shop building that had existed since its foundation was extended in 1967 and used, but was partly destroyed by fire during preparation for its opening on April 9, 1999.

sen.j: 準防火地域に立地するためそのまま再建する事はできなかった。
sen.e: As the shop was located in the semi-fire protection district, the shop could not be reconstructed same as before.

sen.e: As the shop was located in the semi-fire protection district, the shop could not be reconstructed as it was before.

sen.j: 佐川美術館を手がけた内海慎介（竹中工務店社員）が設計し、アルミの外壁は木目調に塗装して一部を弁柄に塗るなど、京都の町屋の雰囲気を出している。
sen.e: Shinsuke UTSUMI (employee of Takenaka Corporation), who designed Sagawa Art Museum, designed, and the aluminium external wall was painted with woodtone and partly in Bengal red to create atmosphere of a merchant house of Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処

sen.j: また、2階部はモルタル金ゴテ仕上げとして墨色に塗り、鉄筋コンクリート造りながら味わいある建物となった。
sen.e: The portion of second story is finished with metal trowel finished mortar and painted in black and, although the building is made with reinforced concrete, it became a impressive one.

sen.j: また、この改築に伴って新たに2階の客席が作られ、1階にも5mのガラス窓が設けられた。
sen.e: On the occasion of this rebuilding, seats for customers on the second floor were made and, on the first floor, a window with glass measuring 5 m was provided.

sen.j: 2000年3月16日より営業を再開し、全店舗中で客席数が最大である。
sen.e: Since March 16, it was reopened and it has the largest number of seats of customers among shops.

sen.j: 2000年に開店した、京都市内で最も新しい店舗。
sen.e: It is the newest shop in Kyoto.

sen.j: 清水寺などに近い事もあって、瓦屋根の純和風な造りである。
sen.e: Partly because it is located near Kiyomizu-dera Temple, pure Japanese-style building with slated roof.
Partly because it is located near Kiyomizu-dera Temple, it has a pure Japanese-style building with slated roof.

sen.j: 福屋広島駅前店の地下1階にあり、席数は全店舗の中で最も少ない。

sen.j: 常連客
sen.e: Regular customers
Regular customers
Regular Customers
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 創業者の猪田七郎は二科会の監事を務め、また山本富士子主演の夜の河や山口百恵主演の古都 (小説)などの映画には本店が登場しており芸術界との関わりが深い。
sen.e: It has close connections with the world of art; Shichiro INODA, who was the founder held a post of the supervisor of the Nika Association and the main shop appeared in movies, Yorunokawa in which Fujiko YAMAMOTO played the leading role and Koto (novel) in which Sayuri YOSHINAGA played the leading role.
sen.cmt: 「（小説）」がなぜここに出てくるのか不明ですが、原文のとおりに訳出しました。
sen.e: It has close connections with the world of art; Shichiro INODA, who was the founder held a post as supervisor of the Nika Association and the main shop appeared in movies, Yorunokawa in which Fujiko YAMAMOTO played the leading role and Koto (novel) where Sayuri YOSHINAGA played the leading role.
